text:

Kan niet slapen, het wordt me teveel

Heb te lang op een wonder gewacht

trans:
The last time I give up
Lie in bed, it's like 2:30
I've got SZA on repeat again
Can't sleep, it's too much
Can't eat anything for days
Don't look for sympathy
It's long past 4
Waited too long for a miracle
You know I don't talk about this
Nobody knows how I really am
Sometimes I feel empty and never heard
But I'm not alone, I'm rising above
This is the last time I cry
The last time I give up
Promise myself I won't break up again
Give zero fucks
Live for myself
Last time I cry
Last time I give up
Promise myself I won't break down anymore
Zero fucks give
Live for myself
Oh no no no
No no no no no
Hey
Oh no no no
